name: Zelenhgorm: The Land of the Blue Moon - Episode 1: The Great Ship
name_original: Zelenhgorm: The Land of the Blue Moon - Episode 1: The Great Ship
description:
Zelenhgorm: The Land of the Blue Moon - Episode 1: The Great Ship is an adventure game developed by Moloto Productions. It came out on 01-09-2002. It was published by Moloto Productions.
You can play Zelenhgorm: The Land of the Blue Moon - Episode 1: The Great Ship on PC.
